summary: Provides a set of decorators that automatically validate the arguments and return values of scientific functions, checking that inputs have appropriate physical units, satisfy value constraints (e.g., non‑negative, finite, non‑NaN), and optionally respect relativistic limits, raising errors or warnings when violations are detected.
business_intent: To enforce physical correctness and robustness in plasma‑physics calculations by ensuring that functions are called with properly‑unit‑annotated and physically plausible data, thereby preventing subtle bugs and improving code reliability.
